body.headline: [I] REPEAT: Data Alert: DIIs net buy 6.4895 bln rupees of shares Jul 3
body.text:
Informist, Tuesday, Jul 4, 2023
     
MUMBAI - Following are details of investments by domestic institutional investors in the Indian stock and debt market for Jun 27 to Jul 3 according to the Securities and Exchange Board of India:

 

    ------------On Jul 3------------
             Equity          Debt
    --------(million rupees)---------
Gross buy38,731.073,710.2
Gross sale32,241.526,977.6
Net investment6,489.546,732.6

For users of real-time market data terminals, Informist news is available exclusively on the NSE Cogencis WorkStation.

 

Cogencis news is now Informist news. This follows the acquisition of Cogencis Information Services Ltd by NSE Data & Analytics Ltd, a 100% subsidiary of the National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. As a part of the transaction, the news department of Cogencis has been sold to Informist Media Pvt Ltd.
